chrome_extension_description.message: A screensaver with multiple photo sources, including your Google Photos.

browser_action_title.message: Photo Screen Saver - click for options

off_abbrev.description: All Caps. max 3 letter abbreviation for OFF

sleep_abbrev.description: All Caps. max 3 letter abbreviation for SLEEP

power_abbrev.description: All Caps. max 3 letter abbreviation for POWER

tooltip_keep_awake.message: The Keep awake features are available even if the screensaver is disabled, so you can use the app as a general power scheduler. The icon will display 'PWR' when in this state.

setting_skip_desc.message: Do not display certain photos in Zoom and Full modes

setting_photog.message: Show name for photos you own

setting_photog_desc.message: Note: Always shows in Frame mode

setting_bg_desc.message: Set the background image of the screensaver

setting_all_displays_desc.message: Show screensaver on all connected displays

setting_full_screen.message: Do not show over fullscreen Chrome windows

setting_full_screen_desc.message: Useful if you are watching videos

setting_keep_awake_desc.message: Prevent display from sleeping (always active if start and stop times are equal)

setting_start_time_desc.message: Allow screensaver display, starting at this time

setting_stop_time_desc.message: Disallow screensaver display after this time

setting_suspend_desc.message: Computer may sleep during inactive time

setting_chromecast_desc.message: Some backdrop photos from the Chromecast device

setting_500yest_desc.message: Recent photos from the 500px, updated daily

setting_flickr_int_desc.message: Interesting photos from the Flickr, updated daily

setting_reddit_space_desc.message: Primarily celestial photos from reddit, updated daily

setting_reddit_earth_desc.message: Primarily landscape photos from reddit, updated daily

setting_reddit_animal_desc.message: Animal photos from reddit, updated daily

setting_mine_desc.message: Photos from the guy who wrote this

setting_click_to_view.message: Click mouse to view the website for Flickr, 500px and reddit photos

setting_flickr_api.message: This product uses the Flickr API but is not endorsed or certified by Flickr

google_shared_albums_note.message: Note: Shared albums may not be available.  See the FAQ for more info.

faq_1_body.message: Right click on the icon in the browser toolbar and select 'Remove from Chrome...'
faq_1_body.description: Values in single quotes are set by Chrome browser please check

faq_2.message: Why aren't all my Google Photos albums showing?

faq_2_body.message: The API that Google provides to interface with Google Photos does not fully support the new shared albums.  To convert an existing shared album to a format the screen saver supports, select the album, click on 'Sharing Options' and unset the 'Share' option.

faq_3.message: I received a Status: 500 error trying to load my Google Photos albums. What does that mean?

faq_3_body.message: This is an error on the Server that provides the photos. This is probably a very temporary issue - please try again later.

faq_4.message: Why is the time label incorrect on my Chromebook?

faq_4_body.message: If you have this problem, go to 'Settings' -> 'Show Advanced Settings' and in the 'Date and time' section uncheck the 'Set time zone automatically using your location'. You will need to re-start for the change to take effect.
faq_4_body.description: Values in single quotes are set by Chrome browser please check

faq_5.message: What do the labels on the icon mean?

faq_5_body1.message: No label: Screensaver is enabled and will be displayed when the computer is idle.

faq_5_body3.message: SLP: The time is in the inactive range of the scheduler. Screensaver will not display.

faq_5_body4.message: PWR: The scheduler will process the keep awake settings, but the screensaver will never display.

faq_6.message: I have the Keep awake off, but my display is not sleeping. Why is that?

faq_6_body1.message: Other applications may be preventing the display or computer from sleeping.

faq_6_body2.message: On many Chrome OS devices the display will not sleep if the screensaver is running. You can use the Screensaver/Keep awake scheduling feature to control when the screensaver is displayed.

faq_7.message: I have the Keep awake on, but my system is shutting down. Why is that?

faq_7_body.message: The Keep awake features are requests to the computer and do not have to be honored. The display request is almost always honored, but the system request isn't. In particular, many PC's will put the computer to sleep if you have them set to do this.

faq_8.message: Can you add support for using files from my local computer?

faq_8_body.message: By default, extensions are not allowed to access the local filesystem.

info_apis_body1.message: This extension has been built entirely with Polymer and vanilla JavaScript.  Polymer treats everything as a

info_apis_body3.message: I have never used things like AngularJS (or even JQuery) so I can't really evaluate the pros and cons of this approach.  In addition, there is nothing in Polymer that prevents you from using it with these other solutions.

info_libs_body1.message: Unfortunately, there is no Google Photos API, so the only way to interact with it is the Picasa Web API. This API only implements a subset of the Google Photos features.

info_libs_body3.message: are a snapshot in time of those used for the backdrop.

info_libs_body4.message: This extension is read only for your Google photos despite what the permissions popup says. The Picasa API does not have a read only scope.

info_web_body.message: This was my first time doing Web development and the learning curve is pretty steep. These sites provides good tutorials and reference materials on the HTML-CSS-JavaScript paradigm.

err_request_failed.message: Request failed. Select refresh to try again.

err_storage_desc.message: Deselect other photo sources and try again.

time_format.description: For translators: Set to 12 for AM/PM format or 24
